definition: lit. directory of orchids/fig. genealogical record (esp. exchanged between sworn brothers)
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
lit. directory of golden orchids/fig. genealogical record (esp. exchanged between sworn brothers)
